response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be around $1,000,000 to you. Considering this, I am extending an offer to sell the product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the market value.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can discuss further details and any potential benefits or customization options that might be of interest to you. I am confident that this product will provide substantial returns on your investment and contribute to the success of your endeavors.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
